docs: the bad : - room smells funny .and he told me " you are in a non - smoking room , sir " . sent up someone to freshen up the roombut it still smelled stale .- rooms are rundown in need of refurbishment .room was clean and smelled pleasant . </DOC> we stayed for four nights in a superior room which was quite nice , although it was a little dated .the breakfast at the hotel was a total nightmare , we had breakfast included in our rate and it seemed that everybody in the restaurant had n't eaten for days as they were literally filling up plates and more plates of food , quite gross ! !room was extremely damp so the linen in the bed was moist , which did n't provide a very good sleep .it 's not as luxury as many 5 stars , but the rooms are clean and the breakfast is very good !the hotel room was spotlessly clean with everything we needed . </DOC> the hotel lobby looks clean and sparkling with delightful lights and decor .toilets were clean and maintained though looked old and tired .so inside is only viewing of each others doors , but quite spacious .but sadly their rooftop glass is super dirty .unpleasant smell in the room .
